attributes.action: Support Police officers by giving them a fair wage.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It has been announced that Police Officers are to be given a 2.5% payrise, since that it suddenly dropped to just under 1.9%. In England and Wales our rise has NOT been back dated, in Scotland it HAS. We have earned it, why aren't the government paying us?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
